name: Spiritin.com
overview:
SPIRITIN.COM is a social network that tributes people that passed away!.

Spiritin is a real opportunity to pay virtual tributes. In each of the Spiritins created for free, clients may write an epitaph, their biography and favorite teachings, store music, photos, and videos, and invite friends and family members to collaborate and joint the spiritinâ€™s community, with the same concept as Orkut and Facebook.

Another aspect is the Treasure Chest, a virtual protected drive where users can keep documents such as letters, e-mails, and other things that only you can access.

This social network was created for remembering loved ones who have already gone. It offers the possibility to pay different types of tributes, such as sending flowers, lighting up candles, and sending messages, as well as a wide range of small memory gifts. Based on a simple interface in a collaborative way the users will find a virtual environment for registering their deepest feelings and get connected with friends and family.
